post:
**[VPSCheap](https://www.vpscheap.net)** has been offering reliable [cheap VPS services](https://www.vpscheap.net/pricing.aspx) since 2011. Our servers are located in a top-tier Dallas facility. 24/7 support is available, with an average time to first response of 17 minutes.

All VPSCheap plans include:

- User-friendly administration panel. Every tool you need to manage your server is available in our control panel.
- Painless DNS management. We offer an integrated DNS management system, so you can get all of your DNS setup in just a few clicks.
- Unmetered bandwidth. We don't limit how much traffic goes through your server. No overage charges, ever.
- Instant setup. The moment your order is paid, our automated system will set up your server and deliver it within 5 minutes.

Today, we're bringing you a series of Early Cyber Monday deals that will be hard to beat. For all our SSD plans, get a 50% one-time discount, plus at least one of the following (the more advanced the package, the more of these benefits you'll get):

- Double the RAM
- Double the SSD storage

**SSD Basic**

- 512MB RAM
- 512MB VSWAP
- 2 CPU Cores
- 10GB SSD Disk Space
- 1 IPv4 address
- 1 IPv6 address
- 35 mbit/s unmetered

<del>$28/year</del>  [$14 for your first billing cycle](https://www.vpscheap.net/deals/cheapest-vps.php)

- <del>512MB</del> 1024MB RAM

- 50 mbit/s unmetered

<del>$3.99/month</del> [$1.99 for your first billing cycle](https://www.vpscheap.net/deals/cheapest-vps.php)
